name: .STORMREPLAY
summary: Learn about .STORMREPLAY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To open a STORMREPLAY file in Heroes of the Storm, first make sure the file is stored in your Heroes of the Storm/​~/​Replays directory. Then, open Heroes of the Storm and select the Watch button found on the game's home screen. A list of your saved Heroes of the Storm replays will appear. After it does, select the replay you want to watch and click Watch Solo to start the replay.
